channel.title: CVE Feed for Logitech -- Sync
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Logitech -- Sync

item.title: CVE-2022-0915|2024-09-16T18:35:00.585Z -- logitech -- sync
item.description: There is a Time-of-check Time-of-use (TOCTOU) Race Condition Vulnerability in Logitech Sync for Windows prior to 2.4.574. Successful exploitation of these vulnerabilities may escalate the permission to the system user.
